mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.cover_bell_id AS "coverBellId", a.cover_id AS "coverId", a.operation_type AS "operationType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_depart AS "createDepart", a.remarks AS "remarks"
LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover_bell_operation( id, update_by, update_date, del_flag, cover_bell_id, cover_id, operation_type, create_by, create_date, create_depart, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{coverBellId}, #{coverId}, #{operationType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createDepart}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover_bell_operation SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, cover_bell_id = #{coverBellId}, cover_id = #{coverId}, operation_type = #{operationType}, create_depart = #{createDepart}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
